errors.channelNameDuplicate: Channel with name {{ channelName }} already exists

messageWarning.mainParagraph: Do not share confidential information like passwords, credit card numbers, or personal identification numbers in the chat. This information is sensitive and could potentially be used for identity theft or fraud if it falls into the wrong hands.
messageWarning.lastParagraph: Keep your personal information safe by keeping it to yourself and not sharing it online.

conversationMessages.searchBarPlaceholder: Search for messages within the current conversation

archiveChannel.title: Archive Channel {{ channelName }} ?
archiveChannel.question: Do you really want to archive the channel {{ channelName }} ?
archiveChannel.description: No one will be able to send messages to the channel. You can unarchive the channel at any time.

unArchiveChannel.title: Unarchive Channel {{ channelName }} ?
unArchiveChannel.question: Do you really want to unarchive the channel {{ channelName }} ?
unArchiveChannel.description: Unarchiving a channel will allow members to post. You can archive the channel again at any time.

deleteChannel.question: Are you sure to delete the channel with name '{{ title }}'? This is a permanent action and cannot be undone.
deleteChannel.confirm: Please enter the title of the channel to confirm.

grantChannelModerator.title: Make {{ userName }} an moderator of {{ channelName }} ?
grantChannelModerator.question: Do you really want to make {{ userName }} an moderator of {{ channelName }} ?
grantChannelModerator.description: This will allow {{ userName }} to manage the channel and its members. They can also edit and delete messages in the channel.

revokeChannelModerator.title: Revoke moderator role of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }} ?
revokeChannelModerator.question: Do you really want to revoke the moderator role of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }} ?
revokeChannelModerator.description: This will revoke the moderator role of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }}. You can grant the moderator role again at any time.

removeUserPrivateChannel.title: Remove user from private channel?
removeUserPrivateChannel.question: Remove {{ userName }} from private channel {{ channelName }} ?
removeUserPrivateChannel.warning: This member will not be able to access this channel anymore unless they are invited again.

removeUserPublicChannel.title: Remove user from public channel?
removeUserPublicChannel.question: Remove {{ userName }} from public channel {{ channelName }} ?
removeUserPublicChannel.warning: This member will not be able to access this channel anymore unless they join again.

removeUserGroupChat.title: Remove user from group chat?
removeUserGroupChat.question: Remove {{ userName }} from group chat?
removeUserGroupChat.warning: This member will not be able to access this group chat anymore unless they are invited again.

memberRow.channelModeratorTooltip: Channel Moderator that can manage the channel and its members

addUsersForm.requiredError: You must select at least one user
addUsersForm.maxError: You can only add {{ max }} users
addUsersForm.addUserLabel: Search for users in the course
addUsersForm.maxUsersNote: Note: You can add {{ max }} users to this conversation

createOneToOneChat.title: Start a direct conversation with another user
createOneToOneChat.userSelectorLabel: Select a user to chat with

createGroupChat.title: Start a group chat between you and a maximum of 9 other users
createGroupChat.userSelectorLabel: Search for users to add to the group chat
createGroupChat.requiredError: You must select at least one user
createGroupChat.maxError: You can only add {{ max }} users

topicInput.label: Topic (optional)
topicInput.topicHelp: What is the channel currently dealing with? (Displayed in header)
topicInput.maxLengthValidationError: The topic can be a maximum of {{ max }} characters long!

createChannel.description: A channel is a way to group people together around a project, a topic, or just for fun. You can create as many channels as you want. You will become the first channel moderator. You will not be able to leave the channel.

nameInput.label: Name
nameInput.maxLengthValidationError: Name can be max {{ max }} characters long!
nameInput.regexValidationError: Names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes. Only Artemis can create channels that start with a $.

descriptionInput.label: Description (optional)
descriptionInput.maxLengthValidationError: Description can be max {{ max }} characters long!

isPublicInput.label: Visibility
isPublicInput.explanation: Every user except instructors will need an invitation to join a private channel. Everybody can join a public channel.

isAnnouncementChannelInput.label: Channel Type
isAnnouncementChannelInput.explanation: Only instructors and channel moderators can create new messages in an announcement channel. Students can only read the messages and answer to them.
